com.edx.ws
Interface EDXVault

All Superinterfaces:
javax.ejb.EJBObject, java.rmi.Remote
public interface EDXVault
extends javax.ejb.EJBObject

The methods in this interface are the public interface of the EDXVault.

Method Summary
 java.lang.String deposit(java.lang.String payload)
          The deposit method creates authoritative copies of contracts in the Vault.
 java.lang.String export(java.lang.String payload)
          The export method removes the authoritative copies of the contracts from the Vault and transfers them back to the requestor.
 java.lang.String getStatus(java.lang.String payloadID)
          The getStatus method returns a status message if a payload's processing is not completed or a response payload containing a collection of responses that corresponds to the collection of requests or search criteria in the original request payload.
 java.lang.String list(java.lang.String payload)
          The list method queries the Vault, to identify the authoritative copies of contracts which match a search criteria.
 java.lang.String retire(java.lang.String payload)
          The retire method expires an authoritative copy of a contract from the Vault, deleting all of the content items.
 java.lang.String transfer(java.lang.String payload)
          The transfer method transfers the ownership of the authoritative copies of the contracts in the Vault.
 
Methods inherited from interface javax.ejb.EJBObject
getEJBHome, getHandle, getPrimaryKey, isIdentical, remove

getStatus

public java.lang.String getStatus(java.lang.String payloadID)
                           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
The getStatus method returns a status message if a payload's processing is not completed or a response payload containing a collection of responses that corresponds to the collection of requests or search criteria in the original request payload.

Parameters:
payloadID - String the payload unique identifier
Returns:
String returnValue the payload response
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - if there is a communications or systems failure
